  • java.lang.Object

              • org.apache.ignite.logger.log4j.Log4JExternallyRolledFileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class Log4JExternallyRolledFileAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.varia.ExternallyRolledFileAppender
    Log4J ExternallyRolledFileAppender with added support for grid node IDs.
